item.title: How do my npc drops work?
item.dc:creator: @xdeathxmagex xdeathxmagex
item.description:
@xdeathxmagex wrote:

Ok here you are:
Open npchandler.java and search:

item2.randomkbd

it should look like:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

after the last } add this:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 9) 
{
if (misc.random2(12) == 1) {
ItemHandler.addItem(995, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 100, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if (misc.random2(12) == 2) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1077, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if (misc.random2(12) == 3) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1089, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if (misc.random2(12) == 4) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1125, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if (misc.random2(12) == 5) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1125, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if (misc.random2(12) == 6) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1151, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

if (misc.random2(12) == 7) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1165, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if (misc.random2(12) == 8) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1195, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if (misc.random2(12) == 9) {
ItemHandler.addItem(2591, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if (misc.random2(12) == 10) {
ItemHandler.addItem(2593, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if (misc.random2(12) == 11) {
ItemHandler.addItem(2595, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if (misc.random2(12) == 12) {
ItemHandler.addItem(2597, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
}

change the npc id to the npc you want…the misc.random2(#) is how many drops you want…change the number after addItem( to the item id you want

did that help?

~~XdeathXmageX

Read full topic
